title: NEW CLIENT WONT OPEN AFTER PRESS LAUNCH
body: I NEED HELP GUYZ.. I DOWNLOAD THE GAME AND AFTER THAT I PRESS LAUNCH AND CLIENT WONT OPEN..I LOOK TASK MANAGER AND NOTHING THEREE...WHAT TO DO??'

replies.body: Ok, go into your League Of Legends folder (like C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/) and start lol.launcher.admin.exe - it worked for me.
I tried and nothing..same problem .. wont open client again
Ugh the amount of people with this problem just keeps going up.  I'm having the same issue
Same From n.a, stuck on Authenticating

Your OS might actually be blocking League from opening, which is something that can happen if you don't have all of the right permissions set up. Run through the steps in our [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and you should be set!
